trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Shelter Cove
There were no other sightings in Shelter Cove on or around July 20th 2009
Summary: Bright light coming from ocean too bright to be a ship
divs: Sighting DetailsWhen I was a child in 1972, I was 6 I was playing in my backyard in a suburb of Detroit, when all of the sudden I turned around due to a breeze I felt over my shoulder and there was a round silver craft with 3 rows of light going around the craft hovering over my neighbors garage and I ran inside to try to convince my mother of what I saw to no avail,I went back out just in time to catch its exit and watched it as it disappeared into the day sky.I could not stop taking about it then the next day my mother said there was an article in the paper about an advertising craft seen in the sky. It all made sense at the time ,i thought as a 6 year old "oh teah just like on the bugs bunny cartoon when the spaceship had lights around it saying "eat at Joes". It was the happened to be in the same direction of the ocean as when I saw something large and metallic the year before 2008 that looked just like the craft I saw as a child, also sometime in June, it plunged in the ocean and never came out I was watching the sunset from my living room window. The incident last summer I awoke at 3:30 in the morning and out my window where the ocean is at least a half a mile down I have abroad view of it due to living on a hill,when i awoke the was the brightest light coming from it seems like the edge of the earth where it curves though I do not know how far my visibility is.This light was so bright the were huge shadows of me on my walls and as bright and far away the source was coming from there was no way it was from a boat or any kind of earthly vessel,it stayed lit for about 20 minutes,although it was early I tried to call my neighbor to verify what I was seeing and the phones were oddly busy,you know that fast busy sound,not a normal one.
